title: Variop Rated Psychology Books [EDITED]
description:
VTRPB, EDITED 

[i did some mistakes as the 1st torrent included 2 broken files, so i removed this and tried to correct categories (there IS a bit of reserve as some books in "others" could be categorized elsewise and i will do that in future for the torrent to became kind of a guide for you guys to help yourselves as much as possible)]

(The list includes books recieving good ratings from Amazon user reviews. I have read reviews before reading the books myself and what I did was to try to recognize which reviews actualy sound believable or not. For example, 1 star rating doesn't mean the book is bad if the review says "I didn't like the cover". :) I also did the same analysis with 4 or 5 star reviews. Then I actualy read many of them. I have to say 75% of the books really were a very good books which added a lot of value in my life.)

This is the list:

ADHD:

- ADHD in Adults A Psychological Guide to Practice (2006)
- delivered_from_distraction_edward_m_hallowell_m_d_
- Driven to Distraction - Jeremy Clarkson
- Healing ADD - Daniel G. Amen

CBT (Cognitive behavioral therapy):

- Mind Over Mood
- David D. Burns - Feeling Good- The New Mood Therapy

COMMUNICATION:

- How to Be an Adult in Relationships - Richo_ David
- How to Win Friends and Influence People
- Leil Lowndes - How to Talk to Anyone (v4.0)
- The Dance of Connection How to Talk to Someone When You're Mad, Hurt, Scared, Frustrated, Insulted-MANTESHWER

- 1118297709Zig_Zag
- Out of Our Minds Learning to Be Creative
- Steal Like an Artist

PSYCHOLOGY IN POKER:
